body.name: 1 Gallon Insulated Water Bottle with Handle and Wide Mouth Water Flask Sweat-Proof and Leak-Proof 128 Oz Stainless Steel Water Jug for Outdoors, Olive
features: Excellent Insulation Performance: This insulated water bottle is double-walled for sweatproof. By adopting the high-quality and food-grade stainless steel, this metal water bottle can maintain drink temperatures for hours without changing the taste. Our testing data shows that the temperature is over 113℉ after 24 hours for hot beverages and below 50℉ after 48 hours for a cold beverage with ice.

Safe Material: Skywell 1 gallon stainless steel water bottle is built with 18/8 stainless steel that's BPA-free. The lid and straw (include straw brush) of the water flask are material of PP. This water jug is a useful blend of quality insulation and heavy-duty construction.

Durable Design: The 128oz thermo is designed with a wide and sturdy handle. The lid of this water bottle has great sealing to perform pretty well on leak-proof. This water flask also comes with two options for drinking, a straw or the spout lid. Spout mouth extra-wide opening for easy filling, drinking, and cleaning is perfect for camping, hiking, and other activities.

Use and Care Tips: 1, Wash this water bottle before use. 2, Never put dry ice in this bottle. 3, Can’t be used in Microwave. 4, Dishwasher not support(except color of stainless steel). 5, Add more ice to keep colder for longer.
Guarantee: Within 18 months, any fault caused by non-artificial reason we will provide replacement for the insulated water bottle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Excellent container for the origin of life SkyWell 1 gallon stainless steel water bottle meets the capacity of 2 days of hydration for an adult. 18/8 food-grade stainless steel provides long-lasting cold and hot effects and takes into consideration the issue of ensuring the water is safe and not tasteless. The only thing to consider is whether to have a hot coffee or a cold beer after pitching the tent.

Previous page SLEEVE Kit version comes with a sleeve, built in 2 straps can be single shoulder bag or dual shoulder bag. HANDLE The strong non-slip handle enables easy carrying. STRUNG Sleeve can be hung on chairs, stands or anywhere with hooks after adjusting the length of strap. Next page 1 SLEEVE 2 HANDLE 3 STRUNG

Anywhere Carry it with you to have a cup of hot or cool water. Anytime Double wall vacuum 18/8 stainless steel provides excellent insulation. Anything Optional kit to enhance practicality. Includes: Sleeve and Bottom Case (128Oz Only)12Oz Cup*2Brush for Jug Anymore Stainless steel is more green and durable than plastic, and no worry anymore about the BPA.

More Capacity 128Oz Insulated Jug 64Oz Insulated Jug 24Oz Insulated Bottle IN 13*6.3*6.3 IN 9.8*5.9*5.9 IN 10.3*3.3*3.3 LBS 3.58 LBS 2.53 LBS 0.95 COOL HOURS >48 COOL HOURS >48 COOL HOURS >24 HOT HOURS >24 HOT HOURS >24 HOT HOURS >12 LID Handle, Chug, Sip LID Handle, Chug, Sip LID Handle, Chug, Sip

Why can't achieve the cooling time as the gallon jug description? Based on no drink. Ice cube will gradually melt after 24 hours to maintain 48 hours cool. Based on intermittent drink. Ice cube and cooling time will decrease as more water is consumed. To extend the time, add ice cubes while refill the water. Why the jug is leaking? Tighten the lid and cap to ensure the silicone gasket is airtight to leak proof. Lying down for long times will lead to water beading on lids from condensation phenomena. How to use the straw? One end of the straw is silicone. It is inserted down into the jug bottom. The other end of the straw connects the funnel for sip. The next time sip water and open the cap, the silicone will bounce and stick out of the mouth of the jug. Can straws be fixed on the lid? Compared fixed in the lid. Design of separate straws is easy to remove and clean. Tighten the lid and insert the straw effortlessly. It avoids the hard to tighten the lid after filling it with ice. When you don't need the straw, take it off. Which service coverage of the jug? Within 18 months, any fault caused by non-human reason we will provide replacement for the jug. Just contact the seller via order details.

Detail Capacity 128 Fl Oz Color Olive Material 18/8 stainless steel, Silicone, PP Size 13"*6.3"*6.3" Weight 3.58 lbs BPA FREE Yes Accessories Straw, Straw brush, Bottom case Dishwasher Safe Hand wash only (CEPT Silver)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thermos. It's HUGE.
reviews.reviewText: I drink a LOT of liquids throughout the day and this is the first thermos I've ever had that feels like it keeps up with me. It's gigantic and heavy (It's a full gallon, so - duh) but I don't travel with it, so It's my constant companion at my home office. It keeps my water ice cold throughout the day. The ultra-wide mouth makes it easy to get my orangutan hands in and clean it. I've knocked it over several times and it doesn't leak (unless the straw hole is open. Again, Duh) I love the inclusion of the extra-long silicone straw, and I especially love the green color. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good water bottle
reviews.reviewText: Great for keeping water cool. A bit chunky and heavy but it’s metal and a gallon! I am glad I bought it! Durable and can take a beating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this water bottle, its big enough for his hand to wash and easy to take with him. Doesn't leak and keeps hot and cold beverages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, rugged stainless steel water bottle
reviews.reviewText: I like this water bottle, especially for the job O do working out of a work van. I like how it’s stainless steel and keeps my water cold all day. A lot better quality than my old plastic one which the water got warm quickly in the direct sun or in a vehicle. Also lid is screw top which doesn’t leak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in the desert!
reviews.reviewText: I threw in some big ice blocks with the water. It kept the water cold and the ice blocks mostly intact at the end of the day while in the blazing heat of the Sonoran Desert. The rubber thing at the bottom is ok but once sand gets in between the rubber and the bottle the thing slides off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great For A Family Road Trip
reviews.reviewText: Fill this up and the water will last you for hours easily. You could pour it into separate bottles or just share the included straw. I have only used this for cold liquids so far. A great buy, just realize it is heavy when filled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The straw was a game changer. This is my husbands favorite cooler. He farms and totes this with him all day. The only thing is some people seem to mention/love all the “extra stuff”…it appears some came with a sleeve and a shoulder strap where ours just came with the bottle and the straw. That said- we love them both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased as a gift
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived and it is as described. I purchased it as a gift so it hasn't been used yet, but the transaction was easy and the item arrived quickly.
